histogram.name: Cros.CrOSActionRecorderEvent
histogram.summary: This histogram is emitted each time when CrOSAction is recorded by the CrOSActionRecorder. For each CrOSAction multiple values can be emitted, corresponding to different events happened during the action processing by CrOSActionRecorder.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.ArchiveType
histogram.summary: Archive type that the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.DeviceMediaType
histogram.summary: Media type of removable device that the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.Fuse.PrematureTermination.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Error returned by the FUSE daemon serving the {FileSystem} filesystem when it unexpectedly terminated (i.e. before being requested by cros-disks to unmount and exit).

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.Fuse.Start.archive
histogram.summary: Error returned by the archive FUSE program when it starts or fails to daemonize.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.Fuse.Start.rar
histogram.summary: Error returned by the RAR FUSE program when it starts or fails to daemonize.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.Fuse.Start.zip
histogram.summary: Error returned by the ZIP FUSE program when it starts or fails to daemonize.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.Fuse.Start.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Error returned by the {FileSystem} FUSE program when it starts or fails to daemonize.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.{Action}.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Error returned by the program {Action} {FileSystem} partition.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Error.{SysCall}.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Error encountered by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon when it tried to {SysCall} {FileSystem} filesystem.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.FilesystemType
histogram.summary: File system type of external media that the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.ReadOnlyFileSystemAfterError
histogram.summary: File system type of external media that the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon had to mount in read-only mode because there was an error when trying to mount them in read-write mode. See crbug.com/1366204.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.StillUnmountingWhenWakingUp
histogram.summary: Number of removable drives that are still in the process of being unmounted when the system wakes up.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Time.BlockSuspend
histogram.summary: Time taken to unmount all the removable drives before the system goes to sleep.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Time.Fuse.PrematureTermination.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Time after which the FUSE daemon serving the {FileSystem} filesystem unexpectedly terminated (i.e. before being requested by cros-disks to unmount and exit).

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Time.Fuse.Start.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Time taken by the {FileSystem} FUSE daemon to start and daemonize.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Time.{Action}.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Time taken by the program {Action} {FileSystem} partition.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Time.{SysCall}.{FileSystem}
histogram.summary: Time taken by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon when it tried to {SysCall} {FileSystem} filesystem.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.FormatCompletedError
histogram.summary: Error returned by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon when formatting an external drive.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.FormatTime
histogram.summary: Time taken by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon to format an external drive.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountCompletedError
histogram.summary: Error returned by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon when mounting a file system.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountErrorMountType
histogram.summary: Combination of (mount type, mount error) returned by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountTime
histogram.summary: Time taken by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon to mount a file system.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.UnmountError
histogram.summary: Error returned by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon when unmounting a file system.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.UnmountTime
histogram.summary: Time taken by the ChromeOS cros-disks daemon to unmount a file system.
